SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UIPATH_JOB_RUNNING#="TRUE" ! initial wait : IF &UC4RB_UIP_WAIT_TIME# GT 0 : SET &INIT_WAIT_TIME# = MULT(&UC4RB_UIP_WAIT_TIME#, 60) : P "Initially waiting for [&UC4RB_UIP_WAIT_TIME#] minutes." : WAIT &INIT_WAIT_TIME# : ENDIF
: SET &JOB_IDS_STR# = STR_SUB (&UC4RB_UIP_JOB_IDS#, "[", "") : SET &JOB_IDS_STR# = STR_SUB (&JOB_IDS_STR#, "]", "") : SET &JOB_IDS_STR# = STR_TRIM(&JOB_IDS_STR#)
: DEFINE &JOB_IDS#, string, 30 : FILL &JOB_IDS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&JOB_IDS_STR#, ",")
: SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&JOB_IDS#[],SIZE) : SET &SUCCESS_COUNT# = 0 : SET &COMPLETE_COUNT# = 0
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_UIPATH.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOB_STATUS
: IF &COMPLETE_COUNT# <> &LEN#
: IF &UC4RB_UIP_RETRY_COUNT# GT 0 : SET &LOOP_COND# = "TRUE" : SET &LOOP_COUNT# = 0 : WHILE &LOOP_COND# = "TRUE" : WAIT &UC4RB_UIP_RETRY_INT# : SET &LOOP_COUNT# = &LOOP_COUNT# + 1 : P "Loop Count: &LOOP_COUNT#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_UIPATH.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOB_STATUS : IF &LOOP_COUNT# = &UC4RB_UIP_RETRY_COUNT# : SET &LOOP_COND# = "FALSE" : ENDIF : IF &COMPLETE_COUNT# = &LEN# : SET &LOOP_COND# = "FALSE" : ENDIF : ENDWHILE : ENDIF
: ENDIF
: IF &SUCCESS_COUNT# <> &LEN# : P "ERROR: Job could not be completed successfully on all the robots specified within specified time limit." : STOP MSG, 50, "ERROR: Timeout Occurred." : ENDIF
